listID.description: The identification of a list of codes

listAgencyID.description: An agency that maintains one or more code lists

listAgencyName.description: The name of the agency that maintains the code list

listName.description: The name of a list of codes

listVersionID.description: The version of the code list

name.description: The textual equivalent of the code content

languageID.description: The identifier of the language used in the corresponding text string

listURI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier that identifies where the code list is located

listSchemeURI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier that identifies where the code list scheme is located
